availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John T. Howell (Shelby County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Shelby County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Ransom Howell and Nancy Gailey Howell. Married to Susan Howell. Father of Henry T. Howell and Shelby W. Howell. Farmer in Shelby County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Shelby County, District 1, p. 12.
_ Illinois, Deaths and Stillbirths Index, 1916-1947 (before 1911)_, Roll #1570850, Illinois Deaths, p.
